title: I discovered the most overpowered Morde bug ever
body:
If a Morde ulted Jhin is killed before he gets his fourth shot off (non-ult), the resulting Jhin ghost will be permanently at 4th shot. It **WILL** apply the on turret crit, and the missing % HP damage.

I can't stop hueing after discovering this.

Reporting this in the report a kha'zix forum, btw.

replies.body:
It's not a bug.
It's a feature.

Most overpowered feature, then.

There's another one that needs to be tested, not sure if it's true or not, but I heard that if it's a Graves or Jhin and they die while reloading, the resulting Ghost won't be able to attack.

because morde ghost copies passive's

but hell if you manage to kill him at 4th shot then why not right

thats so rare
